thread.title: Taulupe Faletau: Dragons seek approval to sell Wales forward
thread.title_full: Taulupe Faletau: Dragons seek approval to sell Wales forward - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Taulupe Faletau: Dragons seek approval to sell Wales forward
text: Newport Gwent Dragons have asked the Welsh Rugby Union (WRU) for permission to sell Wales number eight Taulupe Faletau, BBC Wales Sport understands. Bath have expressed an interest in signing the 24-year-old World Cup player. Faletau has a year left on his current deal and as a Wales player national team head coach Warren Gatland would need to approve such a transfer. The WRU and the Dragons have been asked to comment. More to follow. Also related to this story Share this story Share this page
